import React from 'react'; import { useForm } from '../../context/FormContext'; import Button from '../ui/Button'; const ScanInformation = ({ onNext }) => { const { mobileNumber } = useForm(); const handleNext = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onNext(); }; const sampleIds = [ 'National ID', 'Driver\'s License', 'UMID Card', 'Voter\'s ID', 'Passport', 'Social Security ID (SSS ID)', 'PRC ID' ]; return (
{/* Section 1: Scan a government-issued ID */}

Sample IDs:

{sampleIds.map((id, index) => (
{id}
))}
{/* Section 2: Scan your document */}

Scan your document, if applicable

{/* Section 3: Take a selfie */}

{/* Next Button */}
); }; export default ScanInformation;
